instruction: You are given a question on international law. You are also given 4 answer options (associated with "A", "B", "C", "D"), out of which only one is correct. input:

(A)The Pinochet case confirmed that former heads of State enjoy absolute immunity (B)The Pinochet case confirmed that all public acts enjoy immunity (C)The Pinochet case confirmed that former heads of State cease to enjoy personal immunity once removed from office (D)The Pinochet case confirmed that in respect of immunities there is no difference between a current and a former head of State
